Bending Spoons | Software Engineer | Milan (Italy) | Full time, Visa, Onsite

Bending Spoons is a fast-growing tech company focused on building and marketing mobile applications. We think, create, and market our own apps. We're young (2 years of activity, average age 27 years old), but we've achieved explosive growth: the apps that we've invented, developed, and published have been downloaded more than 30 million times, and millions of people use them every week. We are currently looking for an exceptional Software Engineer to join our team of backend and iOS engineers. Our backend stack consists for the most part of Python, node.js, MongoDB, and Redis. Our iOS work is every bit as extensive and challenging as the backend one, if not more. Among the perks we offer: free lunch five days a week, a cool office, top equipment, and the opportunity to join an incredibly skilled team.

More information and application form at http://bendingspoons.com/en/careers.html (Please mention that you found out about us on HN in your cover letter.)
